channel.title: gtd on David John Baker
channel.description: Recent content in gtd on David John Baker

item.title: Orgflow: 0. Saying No
item.description: As foreshadowed in the introductory post in this series, the orgflow system is not meant to make you more productive.

item.title: Orgflow: How I Work
item.description: We have introduced a new monthly standing meeting at the Music Cognition Group where the focus is meant to be on how to work.

item.title: Personal GTD Categories for Navigating the Day to Day
item.description: After asking Twitter which categories they used to basically “group” together the many “things” in which they have to do, I was mostly met with people (in private) being like “I have no idea even what you are asking”.
